entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. A mix of sun and cloud late this afternoon with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 15 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Thursday 23 March 2023
